AlbumDreamer

Dreams up music albums for any concept given!

About

Bone Beats and Pixelated Dreams

Inugami Korone

Dive into the vibrant beats and whimsical melodies of a unique digital adventure, translated into a sonic journey. Each track, an ode to a world that blends fantasy and gaming, propels the listener through energetic cityscapes, frantic object collections, chaotic battles, peaceful nights, and triumphant conclusions. Immerse yourself in the unpredictable rhythm of this one-of-a-kind experience.

Canine Beats

Vibrant cityscape at dusk with neon signs, a silhouette of a dancing girl with brown hair, dog ears, in a white dress on the rooftop, controller in one hand, boxing gloves in the other.

Nuclear Countdown

A room filled with scattered objects, a 60-second timer on a retro television screen, a focused girl with brown hair, dog ears, in a white dress collecting items.

DOOM Dog's Day

A twisted version of a classic game scene, with a young girl wielding a massive gun against hellish creatures, brown hair, dog ears, white dress, her eyes filled with excitement.

Okakoro Sonata

A warm, homely scene with two girls, one with brown hair, dog ears, in a white dress, the other with cat ears, playing video games together, surrounded by a serene night sky.

Yubi-Yubi Finale

An epic final scene of a game with a brown-haired girl in a white dress reaching for a golden joystick amidst a swirl of colorful pixels, her eyes twinkling with determination.
